main event: Six civilians observed a yellow or red object in elliptical orbit in Mauch Chunk, PA on July 15, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 75 minutes., The object was observed moving in elliptical orbit., Witnesses reported the object changed color from yellow to reddish., Observers reported no sound from the object., The object was seen by at least six civilians in the area.
sighted object: a yellow or red object in elliptical orbit
